topic.title: Error accessing remote server on LAN
topic.body:
I get this unexpected error while using mobile browser  to access a  remote server on my LAN after login.


Serverrror:
 Extra data: line 65 column 2 - line 165 column 2 (char 2859 - 7532) in UiServer.py line 104 > UiPasswordPlugin.py line 41 > UiRequest.py line 145 > UiConfigPlugin.py line 21 > ContentFilterPlugin.py line 186 > UiRequest.py line 348 > UiRequest.py line 421 > UiRequest.py line 204 > UserManager.py line 64 > UserManager.py line 58 > UserManager.py line 27 > __init__.py line 291 > __init__.py line 339 > decoder.py line 367
Please report it if you think this an error.
Details:
{
    "GATEWAY_INTERFACE": "CGI/1.1", 
    "HTTP_ACCEPT": "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8", 
    "HTTP_ACCEPT_ENCODING": "gzip, deflate",
